content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) and an inserter that puts iron ore into the furnace
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) and an inserter that puts iron ore into the furnace

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces are not already full before inserting items. Check the inventory of the furnace to avoid unnecessary insertions.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when there are items available in the furnace. Check the furnace's inventory to confirm the availability of items before extraction.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh the entity data to ensure that the agent is working with the latest state of the map. This helps in avoiding actions based on outdated information.
